comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Looks like Ivan Rafael Rodic, who had the church name (I'm not sure of the ecclesiastical term for the name change) of Archbishop Giovanni Raffaele Rodic, O.F.M. † See his history here, which includes Archbishop of Belgrade: www.catholic-hierarchy.org/bishop/brodic.html and here; www.geocities.com/capitolhill/rotunda/2209/Catholic_Yugos... He was appointed Archbishop on 29 october, 1924, so this photo would be dated after that.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started and entry in Wikipedia for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Raffaele_Rodic
